subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: In ancient Rajasthani society, what was the status of women?
question_hi: प्राचीन rajasthani समाज में महिलाओं का दर्जा क्या था?
A_en: They were considered equal to men
A_hi: उन्हें पुरुषों के समान दर्जा दिया गया था
B_en: They were treated as second-class citizens
B_hi: उन्हें दूसरी श्रेणी के नागरिक के रूप में त्रेता किया गया
C_en: They were considered as property of their husbands
C_hi: उन्हें अपने पति की संपत्ति के रूप में माना जाता था
D_en: They were given equal rights as men
D_hi: उन्हें पुरुषों के समान अधिकार दिए गए
explanation_en: In ancient Rajasthani society, women were considered as property of their husbands.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन rajasthani समाज में, महिलाएं अपने पति की संपत्ति के रूप में मानी जाती थीं।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a major occupation of the people of ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा प्राचीन राजस्थान के लोगों का मुख्य व्यवसाय था?
explanation_en: In ancient Rajasthan, people were engaged in various occupations such as agriculture, trade, commerce, and warfare.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में, लोग कृषि, व्यापार, वाणिज्य और युद्ध जैसे विभिन्न व्यवसायों में शामिल थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the name of the ancient Rajasthani text that described the social system?
question_hi: प्राचीन rajasthani पाठ्य पुस्तक का नाम था जो सामाजिक प्रणाली का वर्णन करता था?
explanation_en: Manu Smriti is an ancient Rajasthani text that described the social system of ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: मानु स्मृति प्राचीन rajasthani पाठ्य पुस्तक है जो प्राचीन राजस्थान की सामाजिक प्रणाली का वर्णन करती है।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: In ancient Rajasthan, which of the following castes was considered as the highest caste?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में, निम्नलिखित जातियों में से कौन सी जाति सबसे उच्च जाति मानी जाती थी?
explanation_en: In ancient Rajasthan, Brahmins were considered as the highest caste.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में, ब्राह्मण सबसे उच्च जाति मानी जाती थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a major festival celebrated in ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा प्रमुख त्योहार मनाया जाता था?
explanation_en: In ancient Rajasthan, various festivals like Diwali, Holi, and Navratri were celebrated.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में, विभिन्न त्योहार जैसे कि दिवाली, होली और नवरात्रि मनाए जाते थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the name of the ancient Rajasthani kingdom that was known for its martial culture?
question_hi: प्राचीन rajasthani राज्य का नाम था जो अपने युद्ध संस्कृति के लिए जाना जाता था?
explanation_en: Mewar was an ancient Rajasthani kingdom that was known for its martial culture.
explanation_hi: मेवाड़ प्राचीन rajasthani राज्य था जो अपने युद्ध संस्कृति के लिए जाना जाता था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: In ancient Rajasthan, what was the name of the social system that was based on the concept of varna?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में, वर्ण के सिद्धांत पर आधारित सामाजिक प्रणाली का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: In ancient Rajasthan, the Caste System was based on the concept of varna.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में, जाति प्रणाली वर्ण के सिद्धांत पर आधारित थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a major deity worshipped in ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा मुख्य देवता पूजा किया जाता था?
explanation_en: In ancient Rajasthan, various deities like Lord Shiva, Lord Vishnu, and Lord Krishna were worshipped.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में, विभिन्न देवताओं जैसे कि शिवजी, विष्णु भगवान और कृष्ण भगवान की पूजा की जाती थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the name of the ancient Rajasthani text that described the spiritual practices?
question_hi: प्राचीन rajasthani पाठ्य पुस्तक का नाम था जो आध्यात्मिक अभ्यासों का वर्णन करता था?
explanation_en: Upanishads is an ancient Rajasthani text that described the spiritual practices.
explanation_hi: उपनिषद प्राचीन rajasthani पाठ्य पुस्तक है जो आध्यात्मिक अभ्यासों का वर्णन करती है।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: In ancient Rajasthan, which of the following was a major art form?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा मुख्य कला रूप था?
explanation_en: In ancient Rajasthan, various art forms like painting, sculpture, and music were prevalent.
explanation_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में, विभिन्न कला रूप जैसे कि चित्रकला, मूर्तिकला और संगीत प्रचलित थे।
